message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.IR 

This paper proposes a joint vision and language model for person re-identification, which involves computer vision (CV) and natural language processing (NLP) techniques. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also introduces new annotations in the form of natural language descriptions, which falls under the sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language). The use of deep learning techniques such as CNN and LSTM suggests that the paper may also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.MM (Multimedia). Finally, the paper involves matching and retrieval tasks, which are common in the sub-category of cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
